#summary Standard Operating Procedure for creating releases

=== Describe the release in NEWS file and commit it ===
{{{
smartcardpp 1.2.3 (2025-09-29)
==============================

- Translation updates
- Implemented a new awesome feature

Many thanks to all the contributors: ...

}}}

=== Bump the version tag in CMakeLists.txt ===
{{{
- set(SMARTCARDPP_VERSION "1.2.2")
+ set(SMARTCARDPP_VERSION "1.2.3")
}}}

=== Tag the release in SVN ===
{{{
svn cp https://esteid.googlecode.com/svn/smartcardpp/trunk \
       https://esteid.googlecode.com/svn/smartcardpp/tags/1.2.3
}}}

=== Create a tarball ===
{{{
svn export https://esteid.googlecode.com/svn/smartcardpp/tags/1.2.3 smartcardpp-1.2.3
tar cjf smartcardpp-1.2.3.tar.bz2 smartcardpp-1.2.3
}}}

=== Upload the tarball ===
{{{
Go to http://code.google.com/p/esteid/downloads/list
Click 'New download'

Summary: smartcardpp 1.2.3 release
Labels: Type-Source
}}}

=== Send out an announcement ===
{{{
Subject: ANNOUNCEMENT: smartcardpp 1.2.3 released
To: esteid-devel@googlegroups.com

I am pleased to announce version 1.2.3 of smartcardpp.

Few lines with short descript what smartcardpp does.

smartcardpp 1.2.3 (2025-09-29)
==============================
<Copy-paste text from NEWS file.>

Downloads
=========
Source code:
http://esteid.googlecode.com/files/smartcardpp-1.2.3.tar.bz2

Contributing
============
There is a developer mailing list at
http://groups.google.com/group/esteid-devel/
}}}
